values: Wow... it been a while... well i most say its been all work and some fun this summer... lets see, i've seen my "friend" alot more than i thought this summer and i don't care what al says i am over him... its kinda one of those things that the more you hang out the mre you realize that maybe you were better off the way that you are now... all though i did find out something about the freshmen that killed my ego alittle but i am all good now... i think i have found a summer "fling" but i can't say becasue every time i think about it, it hurts my tummy and i donno if thats a good thing or a bad thing... I have finally excepted that i am an idiot and i don't care that i can SPELL, for all of you out there that are ready my journal and are thinking how the hell did she graduate... lol... i guess that is one of my MANY flaws... my parents finally kicked my sister out so i have my own room and a BIG bed i am Totally excited! i see my dad in 2 weeks but he leaves saudi in 2 day and i am excited for him... he needs a break.... well.... i most say that an old friend has come back in the picture and this time i hope that i am helping her out for the better... she needs me i think... but we'll see... i know many people don't like her and she is glued to my side but she needs some MAJOR JESUS in her life so i have been taking her to church!... well i guess that all for now i have to get ready for work... catch you on the flip side

Do you believe in magic!

                                           By: Melissa Perez

        Its was something that hit me when you looked at me with those brown eyes that lite up with the radiant color of your soft skin... Never had i seen eyes like those...once we spoke it engraved a smile on my face that i won't soon forget... the laughter that came out of you and the tenderness of your voice is somthing most don't have... it wasn't the till the first time that we touched did i realize how magical this really was... From your soft hands that can mesmorize me to the gentalness of our few kisses that made me weak in the knees and waiting on petals for the next one to come... But now its all gone and it feels like a dream that was to good to be true, not knowing if this had happened at all... i lay there and wonder...believe in magic or hope in this feeling that was so real.. Know when we look at eachother its no longer there, the giggle of love, the addrline of a crush and the warmth of care, its almost like it was never there are the only thing that makes me hold on to those magical moments of time are those eyes that caught me to begin with

 

.... i dedicate this to the one that made my eyes one to a more beautiful place with out even knowing it.... He is an "AWESOME GUY!" xoxo melissa

I's just like to start off by saying what the hell is going through peoples heads now days... My sister came back and right now they are out side talking to the cops she said that she is moving out... i dont undersatnd it...her and her boyfriend or whatever he is have only been going out for a month... i mean is this all worth it... getting kick out of the FAMILY cause my step da told her if she leaves he'll dissown her... she has to fend for her self....i don't understand what is running through her head... i mean and mike is rich or anything... he has no car, no job, doesn't go to skool i mean what the hell is he gonna do for her?....... i donno...... whatever and the sad part is that i  don't feel sorry for her beacuse she was asking for it all along.... i can't feel sorry for her..... NEWAYS... last night was.... CONFUSING.....I went to Jacksons with get this.... AL, Alex, Me, Dan and YALE.... ask me where he fit in that picture but we were gonna play football and stuff she we invited him.... lol... football...anyways by the time we were done at jacksons it was getting pretty dark and so we played football for about 5 min... lol... so then Dan gets this engenius plan to go in to the beach in the dark by himself.... so he goes to go in and went to through al and and she said no... so i donno how i got into it but he said if i through sand at him i'd pay... so he dared me and hey I don't back down off MUST dares.... so i did... and he chased me through half of the beach... finally in my NEW shirt he through he in... and at first it was just good clean fun wrestleing and all off a sudden it got some what.... i don't want to say it....lets just say werid... and i felt like i was fighting for my life.... lets just say that i lost my pants for about 5 minutes and the ocean gobbled my undergarmits.... lol.... it was horrible and for ANYONE who knows me well i hate nudity and i was freaking out.... THANK GOD it was dark....nothing happend.... but i felt like feeling were flying all over and i had mixed feelings... but i got upset cause in the end i knew that to him it was just fun and games and to me it was just alittle more... to make this already long story short we didn't say to words to eachother after that and i know it was nothing to him... so like i told you last night i want to much to just be "friends" but then that "feeling:" gets in the way and anything he does makes it not just friends anymore and i know EVERY girl know how that goes...... so at this point i am just letting it be.... i think......

 

                                                  meli

 

 

                                                  p.s..... Thanks anya i've missed ALL of you.... and happy 18th sorry i wasn't here... your legal... TATOO time... holla if you need someone to go with.....

In the beginning we were such
good friends,
But why did we let our feelings
make it complicated and tense
friends is what we decided on
But who am I trying to con?
Sometimes I am hurting like hell
But no one in this whole world can tell!

When I lay and think, in my bed at night,
the day you'll arrive, seems nowhere in sight.
I toss and I turn, dreaming of you,
opening my eye's... checking if my dream came true.
It didn't, again, and a tear starts to roll,
weeping quietly... my pillow I hold.

Many sleepless nights I've prayed for you, my love.
God touched my soul from heaven above
He's answered my prayers for my bride to be.
I've never felt this lucky, God did this for me.
That's a question I asked each and every night.

He must think your special, Joy, and I know he's right.
No other has made me feel so complete,
my whole life was lived, just so we could meet.
All these thoughts and more going through my head.
I fall asleep not worrying, but dreaming of you... instead
